Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Pefheryneter with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; back-pillar inscribed with Hieroglyphic text; plinth beneath the feet.
Acquisition name: Transferred from: Victoria and Albert Museum (Department of Architecture and Sculpture)
